buffs.name: Feral
buffs.tooltip: Can attack when this zombie enters the battleground

buffs.name: Heavy
buffs.tooltip: Enemies must attack this zombie first

buffs.name: Entry
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie enters the battleground

buffs.name: Death
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie dies

buffs.name: Attack
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates when this zombie attacks

buffs.name: Freeze
buffs.tooltip: Freezes any zombie it damages - a frozen zombie loses it's next turn

buffs.name: Destroy
buffs.tooltip: Zombies damaged by this are removed from battleground

buffs.name: Distract
buffs.tooltip: Zombie with this status is unable to use it's ability

buffs.name: Swing X
buffs.tooltip: Deal X damage to zombies that are adjacent to target

buffs.name: Delayed X
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates after X turns in play

buffs.name: Turn
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates at the start of each turn while in play

buffs.name: End
buffs.tooltip: Ability activates at the end of each turn while in play

buffs.name: Overflow X
buffs.tooltip: Get X Goo over the max goo available, for this turn only

buffs.name: Shield
buffs.tooltip: Guard will absorb the next attack completely and be removed

buffs.name: Devour
buffs.tooltip: Killing a zombie will gain it's attack and / or defense values

buffs.name: Reanimate
buffs.tooltip: Resummon this zombie when it is Destroyed

info.tooltip: horde will get +1 Def and Shield
horde will get +1 Defense and Heavy
horde will heal 2 random ally for 1
horde will get +1 Attack and Rush
horde will get "Freeze a zombie and deal 1 damage to it"

horde will get +2 Defense and Heavy
horde will heal 3 random allies for 1
horde will get +2 Attack and Rush
horde will get "Freeze a zombie and deal 2 damge to it."
